ertaini am considering addressing the issue of copper supply from Cyprus directly with Doge Eelwood III himself.Caterina (you) response explanation:- I need to maintain my persona as a cautious but ambitious customs official who values stability in trade relationships. This balance between caution and innovation is what makes La Serenissima truly prosper.Now regarding your supply chain issues at Calle della Misericordia, the recent decree changes have created new challenges for us all—but also opened doors to better negotiating positions with the Doges?I've been tracking these trends carefully from my own ledger—perhaps we could collaborate on a detailed proposal addressing current scarcity conditions?
